description: Configuration for mapping index weights to basis weights (scripts/weight_mapping.py / WeightMapper).

weights_path.description: CSV of index market-cap weights or index weights used as the target 'b' in mapping. Rows are assets (or dates if timeseries).

coefficients_pivot_path.description: Pivoted coefficients CSV (assets x basis) produced by the local ridge runner. For per-date QP mapping, provide a by-date long-form coefficients file to the backtester instead.

weights_output_path.description: Path to save computed basis weights. Can be a single-row snapshot or a timeseries depending on input coeffs.

turnover_lambda.description: Turnover regularization parameter for QP mapping. When > 0 and a by-date coefficients timeseries is provided, per-date QPs penalize deviations from previous weights.

previous_weights_path.description: Optional CSV path containing previous basis weights to initialize the first QP (one row of basis weights).
